subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It was no surprise that Vince Carter opted out of the final year of his contract with the Nets on Friday and officially became a free agent yesterday. But the Nets expect to reach a deal with him — in the four-year, $60 million range — as early as this week.
